attributes.action: Over turn the adoption of nicky and mark websters 3 children, child A B and C.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr and Mrs Webster have had a huge injustice of character.Their 3 children have been "adopted" out by Norfolk Social Services.One of their children child B seems to from Scurvy a very rare illness which can cause bones to break with normal day to day handling.Norfolk ss decided to take these children away from these caring, loving parents in 1 day because of child B's unexplained fractures he had sustained. These chuldren should be returned to their birth parents and the adoptions all reversed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
